definition: abbr. for Beijing/surname Jing/Jing ethnic minority
capital city of a country/big/algebraic term for a large number (old)/artificial mound (old)

sentences.english: Putin describes his younger self as a poor student and a "hooligan."
sentences.chinese: 普京把少年时的自己形容成差生。

sentences.english: Putin\'s rise continues to perplex even devoted Kremlin observers.
sentences.chinese: 普京的崛起至今让克林姆林宫的观察家们感到迷惑。

sentences.english: Is Medvedev the lapdog of Putin?
sentences.chinese: 梅德韦德夫是普京的小宠物吗？

sentences.english: Experts agreed it was possible Mr Putin had gone under the knife.
sentences.chinese: 专家一致认为普京是动过刀了。

sentences.english: Putin quickly shot the beast and sedated it with a tranquilizer gun.
sentences.chinese: 就在这时，普京迅速拿起一杆麻醉枪将其射倒。

sentences.english: They may be worried about Vladimir Putin, but they are more worried about cutting their losses.
sentences.chinese: 以前他们把宝押在普京身上，现在他们更关注亏损了。

sentences.english: But Putin has deftly managed the windfall and spread the wealth enough so that people feel hopeful.
sentences.chinese: 普京确实致力于将财富分散，所以人们觉得有盼头。

sentences.english: Sobyanin confirmed as new Moscow mayor.
sentences.chinese: 普京副手索比亚宁接任莫斯科市长。

sentences.english: But it’s Georgia that is most likely to suffer from Putin’s return.
sentences.chinese: 但是，最有可能因为普京的回归而遭殃的是格鲁吉亚。

sentences.english: Putin himself is sardonic but humorless.
Putin said that he also knew the content of President Jiang?
sentences.chinese: 普京说，我也了解了江主席在会议上的发言内容。

sentences.english: Has Russia's prime minister gone under the knife?
sentences.chinese: 俄罗斯总理普京脸上到底动没动刀？

sentences.english: In August, Putin seemed to predict this kind of escalation.
sentences.chinese: 今年八月，普京似乎预测这类事件的升级。

sentences.english: Putin is wearing his famous judo outfit. He looks terrific, relaxed.
sentences.chinese: 普京穿着他那套著名的柔道服，看上去棒极了。

sentences.english: Putin also made clear Russia's stance and views on issues like anti-terrorism.
sentences.chinese: 普京还介绍了俄对反对恐怖主义等问题的立场和看法。

sentences.english: From time to time, Putin likes to use a dirty word or utter an obscene threat.
sentences.chinese: 时不时地，普京喜欢用脏字或者突然说出下作的恐吓。

definition: Medvedyev (name)/Dmitry Anatolyevich Medvedev (1965-), Russian lawyer and politician, president of Russian Federation from 2008
Erdogan (name)/Recep Tayyip Erdoğan (1954-), Turkish politician, prime minister from 2003
Donald Trump (1946-), American business magnate, US president 2017-
Yeltsin (name)/Boris Yeltsin (1931-2007) first post-communist president of Russia 1991-1999
Lavrov (name)/Sergey Viktorovich Lavrov (1950-), Russian diplomat and politician, Foreign minister from 2004
Russia/Russian/abbr. for 俄羅斯|俄罗斯[E2 luo2 si1]/Taiwan pr. [E4]
Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
Angela Merkel (1954-), German CDU politician, chancellor from 2005
